question:
The United Nations recently designated the International Tea Day. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Quality tea production starts in May.
  2. International Tea Day is to be observed in December.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: Production of quality tea leaves begins in May in most of the tea producing countries. Some of the major tea producing states are India, China, Bangladesh, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Tanzania, Kenya, etc. The International Tea Day is intended to raise awareness about the benefits of tea and also to support the tea producers. Statement 2 is incorrect: International Tea Day is to be observed on May 21st according to the UN. Till now, December 15th of every year was considered the International Tea Day. The change was made at the proposal of India at the FAO intergovernmental group.
